parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: UpgradeStatusInfo object creation
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

status.description: Upgrade event status. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

end_time.description: Task end time. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

duration.description: Time taken to complete upgrade event in seconds. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

ip.description: Ip of the node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

start_time.description: Task start time. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

message.description: Upgrade event message if any. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

skip_suspended.description: Skip upgrade on suspended SE(s). Field introduced in 18.2.6.

action_on_error.description: The error recovery action configured for a SE Group. Enum options - ROLLBACK_UPGRADE_OPS_ON_ERROR, SUSPEND_UPGRADE_OPS_ON_ERROR, CONTINUE_UPGRADE_OPS_ON_ERROR. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_with_vs_not_scaledout.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

se_already_upgraded_at_start.description: ServiceEngines are already upgraded before the upgrade. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_disconnected_at_start.description: ServiceEngines in disconnected state before starting the upgrade. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_upgrade_errors.description: ServiceEngineGroup upgrade errors. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_reboot_in_progress_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

se_upgrade_in_progress.description: ServiceEngines upgrade in progress. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

state.description: Enum options - SE_UPGRADE_PREVIEW, SE_UPGRADE_IN_PROGRESS, SE_UPGRADE_COMPLETE, SE_UPGRADE_ERROR, SE_UPGRADE_PRE_CHECKS, SE_IMAGE_INSTALL, SE_UPGRADE_IMAGE_NOT_FOUND, SE_ALREADY_UPGRADED, SE_REBOOT, SE_CONNECT_AFTER_REBOOT, SE_PRE_UPGRADE_TASKS, SE_POST_UPGRADE_TASKS, SE_WAIT_FOR_SWITCHOVER, SE_CHECK_SCALEDOUT_VS_EXISTS, SE_UPGRADE_SEMGR_REQUEST, SE_UPGRADE_SEMGR_SE_UNREACHABLE, SE_PRE_UPGRADE_SCALE_IN_OPS, SE_POST_UPGRADE_SCALE_OUT_OPS, SE_UPGRADE_SUSPENDED, SE_UPGRADE_START, SE_UPGRADE_PAUSED, SE_UPGRADE_FAILED, SE_UPGRADE_VERSION_CHECKS, SE_UPGRADE_CONNECTIVITY_CHECKS, SE_UPGRADE_VERIFY_VERSION, SE_UPGRADE_SKIP_RESUME_OPS, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_NOT_STARTED, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_ENQUEUED, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_ENQUEUE_FAILED, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_IN_PROGRESS, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_COMPLETE, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_ERROR, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_SUSPENDED, VS_DISRUPTED, VS_SCALEIN, VS_SCALEIN_ERROR, VS_SCALEIN_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, VS_SCALEOUT, VS_SCALEOUT_ERROR, VS_SCALEOUT_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, VS_SCALEOUT_ERROR_SE_NOT_READY, VS_MIGRATE, VS_MIGRATE_ERROR, VS_MIGRATE_BACK, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_ERROR, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_NOT_NEEDED, VS_MIGRATE_ERROR_NO_CANDIDATE_SE, VS_MIGRATE_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_ERROR_SE_NOT_READY, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, SEGROUP_PAUSE_PLACEMENT, SEGROUP_RESUME_PLACEMENT, SEGROUP_CLOUD_DISCOVERY, SEGROUP_IMAGE_GENERATION, SEGROUP_IMAGE_COPY_INSTALL_TO_SES, SEGROUP_SERIAL_SE_UPGRADE, SEGROUP_PARALLEL_SE_UPGRADE, SEGROUP_V2_TO_V1_ROLLBACK, SEGROUP_FAILED_SE_ERROR_RECOVERY, SEGROUP_SE_CONNECTIVITY_CHECKS, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_START.

vs_migrate_in_progress_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type VirtualService.

se_upgrade_skip_suspended.description: Service Engines that were in suspended state and were skipped upon Service Engine Group ugprade resumption. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

se_ip_missing_at_start.description: ServiceEngines local ip not present before the upgrade. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

vs_scalein_in_progress_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type VirtualService.

se_upgrade_completed.description: ServiceEngines upgrade completed. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

in_progress.description: ServiceEngineGroup upgrade in progress. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_upgrade_not_started.description: ServiceEngines upgrade not started. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_with_vs_scaledout.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

se_with_no_vs.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

se_upgrade_suspended.description: Service Engines which triggered Service Engine Group to be in suspended state. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant.

vs_scaleout_in_progress_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type VirtualService.

disrupted_vs_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type VirtualService.

se_upgrade_failed.description: ServiceEngines upgrade failed. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_poweredoff_at_start.description: ServiceEngines in poweredoff state before the upgrade. It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

vs_errors.description: VirtualService errors during the SeGroup upgrade. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

image_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying base image. It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

patch_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying patch. It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_group_resume_options.description: Apply options while resuming SE group upgrade operations. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_group_options.description: This field identifies SE group options that need to be applied during the upgrade operations. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant.

se_group_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngineGroup.

vs_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type VirtualService.

reason.description: Descriptive reason for the state-change. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

state.description: The upgrade operations current fsm-state. Enum options - UPGRADE_FSM_INIT, UPGRADE_FSM_STARTED, UPGRADE_FSM_WAITING, UPGRADE_FSM_IN_PROGRESS, UPGRADE_FSM_ENQUEUED, UPGRADE_FSM_ERROR, UPGRADE_FSM_SUSPENDED, UPGRADE_FSM_ENQUEUE_FAILED, UPGRADE_FSM_PAUSED, UPGRADE_FSM_COMPLETED, UPGRADE_FSM_ABORT_IN_PROGRESS, UPGRADE_FSM_ABORTED. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

last_changed_time.description: The last time the state changed. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

task.description: Enum representing the task. Enum options - PREPARE_FOR_SHUTDOWN, COPY_AND_VERIFY_IMAGE, INSTALL_IMAGE, POST_INSTALL_HOOKS, PREPARE_CONTROLLER_FOR_SHUTDOWN, STOP_CONTROLLER, EXTRACT_PATCH_IMAGE, EXECUTE_PRE_INSTALL_COMMANDS, INSTALL_PATCH_IMAGE, PREPARE_FOR_REBOOT_CONTROLLER_NODES, REBOOT_CONTROLLER_NODES, WAIT_FOR_ALL_CONTROLLER_NODES_ONLINE, PRE_UPGRADE_HOOKS, MIGRATE_CONFIG, START_PRIMARY_CONTROLLER, START_ALL_CONTROLLERS, POST_UPGRADE_HOOKS, EXECUTE_POST_INSTALL_COMMANDS, SET_CONTROLLER_UPGRADE_COMPLETED, STATE_NOT_USED_IN_V2, COMMIT_UPGRADE, UNKNOWN_TASK, PATCH_CONTROLLER_HEALTH_CHECK. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

nodes_events.description: List of all events node wise. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

previous_image_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying previous base image.Example  Base-image was 18.2.5 and an upgrade was done to 18.2.6, then this field will indicate the 18.2.5 value. . It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

enable_patch_rollback.description: Check if the patch rollback is possible on this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

start_time.description: Start time of Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

patch_version.description: Current patch version applied to this node. Example  Base-image is 18.2.6 and a patch 6p1 is applied, then this field will indicate the 6p1 value. . Field introduced in 18.2.6.

upgrade_ops.description: Upgrade operations requested. Enum options - UPGRADE, PATCH, ROLLBACK, ROLLBACKPATCH, SEGROUP_RESUME. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

node_type.description: Type of the system such as controller_cluster, se_group or se. Enum options - NODE_CONTROLLER_CLUSTER, NODE_SE_GROUP, NODE_SE_TYPE. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

previous_patch_image_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying previous patch.Example  Base-image was 18.2.6 with a patch 6p1. Upgrade was initiated to 18.2.8 with patch 8p1. The previous_image field will contain 18.2.6 and this field will indicate the 6p1 value. . It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

seg_status.description: Detailed SeGroup status. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

obj_cloud_ref.description: Cloud that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type Cloud. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

duration.description: Duration of Upgrade operation in seconds. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

patch_image_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying the current patch.Example  Base-image is 18.2.6 and a patch 6p1 is applied, then this field will indicate the 6p1 value. . It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

upgrade_events.description: Events performed for Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

tasks_completed.description: Completed set of tasks in the Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

enable_rollback.description: Check if the rollback is possible on this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

uuid.description: UUID Identifier for the system such as cluster, se group and se. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

previous_version.description: Previous version prior to upgrade.Example  Base-image was 18.2.5 and an upgrade was done to 18.2.6, then this field will indicate the 18.2.5 value. . Field introduced in 18.2.6.

tenant_ref.description: Tenant that this object belongs to. It is a reference to an object of type Tenant. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

system.description: Flag is set only in the cluster if the upgrade is initiated as a system-upgrade. . Field introduced in 18.2.6.

enqueue_time.description: Enqueue time of Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

name.description: Name of the system such as cluster name, se group name and se name. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

state.description: Current status of the Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

version.description: Current base image applied to this node. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

params.description: Parameters associated with the Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

total_tasks.description: Total number of tasks in the Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

se_upgrade_events.description: ServiceEngineGroup upgrade errors. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

image_ref.description: Image uuid for identifying the current base image. It is a reference to an object of type Image. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

previous_patch_version.description: Previous patch version applied to this node.Example  Base-image was 18.2.6 with a patch 6p1. Upgrade was initiated to 18.2.8 with patch 8p1. The previous_image field will contain 18.2.6 and this field will indicate the 6p1 value. . Field introduced in 18.2.6.

end_time.description: End time of Upgrade operation. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

to_se_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

task.description: Enum options - SE_UPGRADE_PREVIEW, SE_UPGRADE_IN_PROGRESS, SE_UPGRADE_COMPLETE, SE_UPGRADE_ERROR, SE_UPGRADE_PRE_CHECKS, SE_IMAGE_INSTALL, SE_UPGRADE_IMAGE_NOT_FOUND, SE_ALREADY_UPGRADED, SE_REBOOT, SE_CONNECT_AFTER_REBOOT, SE_PRE_UPGRADE_TASKS, SE_POST_UPGRADE_TASKS, SE_WAIT_FOR_SWITCHOVER, SE_CHECK_SCALEDOUT_VS_EXISTS, SE_UPGRADE_SEMGR_REQUEST, SE_UPGRADE_SEMGR_SE_UNREACHABLE, SE_PRE_UPGRADE_SCALE_IN_OPS, SE_POST_UPGRADE_SCALE_OUT_OPS, SE_UPGRADE_SUSPENDED, SE_UPGRADE_START, SE_UPGRADE_PAUSED, SE_UPGRADE_FAILED, SE_UPGRADE_VERSION_CHECKS, SE_UPGRADE_CONNECTIVITY_CHECKS, SE_UPGRADE_VERIFY_VERSION, SE_UPGRADE_SKIP_RESUME_OPS, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_NOT_STARTED, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_ENQUEUED, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_ENQUEUE_FAILED, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_IN_PROGRESS, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_COMPLETE, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_ERROR, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_SUSPENDED, VS_DISRUPTED, VS_SCALEIN, VS_SCALEIN_ERROR, VS_SCALEIN_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, VS_SCALEOUT, VS_SCALEOUT_ERROR, VS_SCALEOUT_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, VS_SCALEOUT_ERROR_SE_NOT_READY, VS_MIGRATE, VS_MIGRATE_ERROR, VS_MIGRATE_BACK, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_ERROR, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_NOT_NEEDED, VS_MIGRATE_ERROR_NO_CANDIDATE_SE, VS_MIGRATE_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_ERROR_SE_NOT_READY, VS_MIGRATE_BACK_ERROR_RPC_FAILED, SEGROUP_PAUSE_PLACEMENT, SEGROUP_RESUME_PLACEMENT, SEGROUP_CLOUD_DISCOVERY, SEGROUP_IMAGE_GENERATION, SEGROUP_IMAGE_COPY_INSTALL_TO_SES, SEGROUP_SERIAL_SE_UPGRADE, SEGROUP_PARALLEL_SE_UPGRADE, SEGROUP_V2_TO_V1_ROLLBACK, SEGROUP_FAILED_SE_ERROR_RECOVERY, SEGROUP_SE_CONNECTIVITY_CHECKS, SEGROUP_UPGRADE_START.

se_group_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngineGroup.

se_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

vs_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type VirtualService.

from_se_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type ServiceEngine.

action_on_error.description: The error recovery action configured for a SE Group. Enum options - ROLLBACK_UPGRADE_OPS_ON_ERROR, SUSPEND_UPGRADE_OPS_ON_ERROR, CONTINUE_UPGRADE_OPS_ON_ERROR. Field introduced in 18.2.6.

disruptive.description: Disable non-disruptive mechanism. Field introduced in 18.2.6.
